The four corners of the whiteboard dry-erase are circular so that the dry-erase board does not scratch your hand.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE: Having a weekly dry erase board on hand is a necessity. product_description: Help Your Kids Slay Chores Like Little Legends With ZICOTO’s Adorable Chore Chart For Kids! Turning daily chores into an exciting adventure has never been easier thanks to ZICOTO’s vibrant chore and reward chart for kids. Designed to make routine tasks feel less like a chore and more like a game, the chores chart for kids help children take pride in their responsibilities while building confidence with every sticker they earn. Watch as your little ones light up with enthusiasm, eager to check off each task and earn colorful rewards that make their efforts feel truly special. Perfect for busy homes and lively classrooms alike, the kids chore chart is a versatile tool that encourages good habits and positive reinforcement. It’s thoughtfully crafted to grow alongside your child, adapting as they develop new skills and take on fresh challenges. Whether you’re managing one busy bee or juggling multiple kids, the reward chart keeps everything organized and on track without adding stress to your day. The sweet unicorn design captures every girl’s imagination! Gentle pastel colors and playful artwork make each sticker chart feel like a magical journey, not a chore. Add in seven sticker sheets - six vibrant star-filled sheets plus one with adorable unicorns - and you’ve got a perfect mix of fun and motivation that keeps kids going. Each 12.4x9.84” chore chart for multiple kids offers plenty of room to write down daily tasks and goals, with perforated edges for easy removal. The paper charts stand up to the hustle and bustle of family life while remaining easy to handle and display on refrigerators, walls, or bulletin boards. Keep kids motivated and routines smooth with ZICOTO’s clever behavior chart for kids at home or school designed to make habit-building totally fun!
